title: Dish, "East Asian Face", ca. 1935
markings: Marks: On underside: hammer, sickle, cog stamped in blue underglaze; "Made in Russia / U.S.S.R." stamped in red overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with deeply raised edge; painted with stylized East Asian face and stylized flowers in center, stylized leaf border

tombstone.epitaph:
Dish, "East Asian Face", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-75.
